basics.name: Raj Sonawala
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with extensive experience building scalable applications using Angular, Laravel, Spring Boot, and PHP. Strong background in both frontend and backend development, REST APIs, ETL processes, and cloud technologies.

work.name: Bosch Rexroth AG
work.summary: Designed and developed scalable backend systems using PHP 8 MVC and Laravel 11, integrated with MySQL databases managing over 7 million records. Built responsive, user-friendly interfaces with Angular and Angular Material, delivering seamless user experiences. Developed full-stack applications to streamline data workflows for the sales department.
highlights: Built backend systems with PHP 8 MVC and Laravel 11.
Managed large-scale data (7M+ records) in MySQL.
Created responsive interfaces with Angular and Angular Material.
Streamlined data workflows for the sales department.

work.name: Bosch Rexroth AG
work.summary: Created and documented REST APIs using Swagger UI. Resolved critical bugs and maintained legacy systems built with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and PHP. Developed an ETL process using KNIME to automate data extraction from SAP to MySQL.
highlights: Created/documented REST APIs with Swagger UI.
Automated ETL from SAP to MySQL using KNIME.

work.name: Uni-app.com
work.summary: Automated extraction of HTML data from thousands of partner websites using Python, BeautifulSoup, and Selenium. Structured data into CSVs and injected into OpenSearch for real-time analytics. Maintained OpenSearch operations ensuring 99% uptime.
highlights: Automated data extraction using Python, BeautifulSoup, Selenium.
Processed data into CSVs and OpenSearch.

work.name: Udrus (NEOM GmbH)
work.summary: Rebuilt a monolithic WordPress site into a scalable Angular 17 and Spring Boot 11 application. Implemented REST APIs and integrated Google/Facebook login. Designed search with pagination, reducing search time by 40%.
highlights: Migrated from WordPress to Angular 17 & Spring Boot 11.
Reduced search time by 40% with pagination.

education.institution: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: After Market Intelligence Tool
projects.description: Full-stack dynamic web application for managing millions of product records. Used Angular 11 for front-end and Laravel 11 for back-end, optimizing relational search via REST APIs.
highlights: Reduced search query time to milliseconds with optimized APIs.
Built search features that process millions of records instantly.
Implemented RBAC to secure user-specific data access.
Developed intuitive UI with Angular, Bootstrap, Material UI.

certificates.name: APIs in PHP: from Basic to Advance
